sentence: Mandel has received support from Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) and Sen. Mike Lee (R-Utah), and Vance has the backing of Sen. Josh Hawley (R-Mo.)

title: Cruz endorses Josh Mandel in Ohio Senate race

sentence: Two pictures of Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn (N.C.) shared with Politico show the embattled congressman at what appears to be a party in women's lingerie.

title: Photos show Cawthorn wearing lingerie at apparent party: Politico
